titleStmt.title: On the death of the truly valiant, and loyal George, Duke of Albemarle, late general of His Majesties forces, and knight of the Honorable Order of the Garter a pindariqu' ode / by Thomas Flatman.
titleStmt.author: Flatman, Thomas, 1637-1688.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
